name: typedoc-hugo-theme
description: An extension of the Markdown theme from typedoc-plugin-markdown that prepends Hugo Front Matter variables in YAML format to pages.

scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run lint && npm run build
scripts.build-and-test: npm run build && npm run test
scripts.demo: rm -rf ./demo && npm run build && typedoc --plugin typedoc-plugin-markdown --plugin ./dist ../typedoc-plugin-markdown/test/stubs/src/index.ts --tsconfig ../typedoc-plugin-markdown/test/stubs/tsconfig.json --theme hugo --out ./demo

author: Thomas Grey
